title: Make America North Korea Again, Manafort Sippin Pruno 6.15.18
itunes:title: Make America North Korea Again, Manafort Sippin Pruno 6.15.18
description:
In episode 170, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Jamie Loftus (The Bechdel Cast) to discuss Menghazi starring Chris Hardwick, the AT&T / Time Warner Merger, Trumps strange appearance on Fox & Friends, Manafort going to jail, Scott Pruitt shenanigans, Bloid Watch and More!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
